abstract: The federal government's September 11th Victim Compensation Fund has begun registering people who believe they were physically harmed by the terrorist attacks and who are seeking financial compensation.
snippet: The federal government's September 11th Victim Compensation Fund has begun registering people who believe they were physically harmed by the terrorist attacks and who are seeking financial compensation.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: James Zadroga 9-11 Health and Compensation Act

lead_paragraph: The federal government's September 11th Victim Compensation Fund began taking registrations Monday from people who believe they were physically harmed by the terrorist attacks and who are seeking financial compensation.

headline.main: Registration Begins for 9/11 Health Compensation Fund
